description: An example of a d-perfect sequence.
comments: Fixed point of the morphism 0 -> 000, 1 -> 120, 2 -> 210, starting from a(1) = 1 and finally 0 -> 000, 1 -> 111 & 2 -> 222.Equals Catalan(n) mod 3. (Cf. A000108.) - _Paul D. Hanna_, Jun 20 2003 [confirmed by _Christian G. Bower_, Jun 12 2005]Catalan numbers: C(n) = binomial(2n,n)/(n+1) = (2n)!/(n!(n+1)!).
